entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
